## RequestHandler.canHandleRequest() method

If it can handle the request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canHandleRequest(request: Request, context: Context): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | Request | Potential request for the handler |
|  context | [Context](./stentor-models.context.md) | Context for the request |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

If the handler can handle the provided request with given context
